blogs.title: To Fill the Whole Universe
blogs.content: He who descended is the very one who ascended higher than all the Universe, in order to fill the whole Universe On the whole, a problem is a thing regarded as difficult to understand or to deal with. Is there anything difficult to understand or to deal with? What sort of a thing which can be classed as difficult to understand or to deal with? First of all, let me clarify what the word difficult so-called means. Difficult so-called means: not easy, needing effort or skill to do or to understand. Such a definition truly leads all human beings astray. If carrying out or to understand a particular thing requires effort or skill, verily it is a truth, and what is the matter? Answer this question before reading further.
blogs.author: Peyton Jones Paul
